bioconda.name: bioconductor-bufferedmatrix
bioconda.summary: A matrix data storage object held in temporary files

biotools.summary: A tabular style data object where most data is stored outside main memory. A buffer is used to speed up access to data.

bioschemas.name: BufferedMatrix
bioschemas.summary: A tabular style data object where most data is stored outside main memory. A buffer is used to speed up access to data.
